text: Dobryanka (, 58°27′N, 56°25′E) is a town in Perm Krai, Russia. It is a center of Dobryansky District. As of 2005, there were about 36,100 people. Dobryanka was founded in 1623 and became a town in 1943. It is one of the oldest settlements of Perm Krai. Category:Cities and towns in Perm Krai
title: Dobryanka
